Miscellaneous
=============

This section describes core functionality within HWIOS that doesn't fit in any category specifically (yet).

Menu
~~~~
Renders a simple recursive menu from the database...

.. automodule:: services.web_ui.models.menu
   :members:
   :show-inheritance:

       
Settings
~~~~~~~~
Simple settings controller to manage some HWIOS settings that are managed from the database.

.. automodule:: services.web_ui.controllers.ws.settings
   :members:
   :show-inheritance:


Miscellaneous Websocket controller
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Some views don't fit in any module, so they end up here...

.. automodule:: services.web_ui.controllers.ws.misc
   :members:
   :show-inheritance:
